entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
